revisionDesc.change: Converted to P5 and hand-tidied where necessary

div.head: Manuscript list
div.p: DIAMM will eventually list all known manuscripts of Medieval European Music, together with metadata about each source. A large proportion of the catalogued sources are already described in our database and these descriptions can be accessed by following the links below, which include manuscripts not photographed and archived by the project as well as those already archived. The manuscripts are listed by the country and archive where they are to be found, not by their provenance.

Not all images archived by DIAMM are available via the website portal, but this list is constantly under review. Sources followed by a tick in the following lists may be viewed at high resolution online by registered users. Registration is free of charge and open to anyone wishing to access these documents (please follow links for Registering). You may also search the content by using the 'Search' link. Library contacts and a detailed manuscript list for each archive may be viewed by clicking on a library name.
